channel.title: Exp rates

item.title: Exp rates
item.dc:creator: @hat_trix hat trix
item.description:
@hat_trix wrote:

right there infront of you.
u see where it says total xp? for everyone one that has a (numberhitdif)
change it to what you would like it to be.
forinstance, attack str and def on runescape would be like so
TotalExp = (double)(4hitDiff);
and health would be something like this
TotalExp = (double)(1.334*hitDiff);
or something. that would be extreemly close, if not accurate to runescapes xp.

Read full topic

item.title: Exp rates
item.dc:creator: @check check
item.description:
@check wrote:

i was wondering how can i change my exp rates right now its at

}
double TotalExp = 0;
if (UseBow || UseCrossBow) {
TotalExp = (double)(300hitDiff);
TotalExp = (double)(TotalExpCombatExpRate);
addSkillXP((int)(TotalExp), 4);
} else if (FightType != 3) {
TotalExp = (double)(200hitDiff);
TotalExp = (double)(TotalExpCombatExpRate);
addSkillXP((int)(TotalExp), SkillID);
} else {
TotalExp = (double)(200hitDiff);
TotalExp = (double)(TotalExpCombatExpRate);
addSkillXP((int)(TotalExp), playerAttack);
addSkillXP((int)(TotalExp), playerDefence);
addSkillXP((int)(TotalExp), playerStrength);
}
TotalExp = (double)(200hitDiff);
TotalExp = (double)(TotalExpCombatExpRate);
addSkillXP((int)(TotalExp), playerHitpoints);
attackTimer = 7;

and when ever u hit 1 u go from 1atk to 27atkâ€¦

Read full topic
